abstract: House will consider first major bill of new Republican Congress that would alter definition of full workweek under Affordable Car Act, to 40 hours instead of 30; conservatives are resisting move, however, saying it would put people at risk of reduced hours.
lead_paragraph: The legislative priority for the new Republican Congress would change the definition of a full workweek, under the Affordable Care Act, to 40 hours, rather than 30.
snippet: The legislative priority for the new Republican Congress would change the definition of a full workweek, under the Affordable Care Act, to 40 hours, rather than 30.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Resistance From Right Slows G.O.P. Press to Redefine Full-Time Worker
headline.print_headline: Resistance From Right Slows G.O.P. Press to Redefine Full-Time Worker
